testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user can't login with invaid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "test3@test.com" and "123456789"...............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user can't login to the system.........................................passed

testcase.name: User could reset password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user open login page..................................................passed When user click on Forgot Password?.........................................passed And user enter valid "test@example.com".....................................passed And user click on RECOVER button............................................passed Then Email with instructions will be sent...................................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product name
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter "apple" and click enter.....................................passed Then user get products contain "apple"......................................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product name 2
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter "laptop" and click enter....................................passed Then user get products contain "laptop".....................................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product name 3
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter "camera" and click enter....................................passed Then user get products contain "camera".....................................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product sku
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter sku "SCI_FAITH" and click enter.............................passed And user click on product from search result................................passed Then Used "SCI_FAITH" shown in the product page.............................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product sku 2
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter sku "APPLE_CAM" and click enter.............................passed And user click on product from search result................................passed Then Used "APPLE_CAM" shown in the product page.............................passed

testcase.name: User could search with product sku 3
testcase.system-out: Given user click on search field............................................passed When user enter sku "SF_PRO_11" and click enter.............................passed And user click on product from search result................................passed Then Used "SF_PRO_11" shown in the product page.............................passed

testcase.name: User change currency
testcase.system-out: Given User click on currency list and select currency.......................passed Then Items price is in Euro.................................................passed

testcase.classname: Hover on main categories then select sub category
testcase.name: Hover on one of main categories then select sub category
testcase.system-out: When User hover randomly on one of main categories..........................passed Then user redirected to sub category page...................................passed
